attributes.action: issue pebbles with her international passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
send pebbles to las vegas to her mother susan boyle who is set to get the states rocking. 
wow - 75 million people watching her tonight on 'america's got talent' final as the only guest act. what about that for the u.k. economy!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
